identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

accent.name: Clay Action
accent.usage: Primary CTAs (Start Timer), Active States, Highlights

split_view.left_panel: lg:col-span-8 h-full overflow-y-auto p-6 lg:p-12 custom-scrollbar
split_view.right_panel: lg:col-span-4 h-full border-l border-stone-200 bg-white/50 backdrop-blur-sm p-6 flex flex-col gap-6 shadow-[-4px_0_24px_rgba(0,0,0,0.02)]

presentation_mode.container: fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-slate-950 text-white flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-12
presentation_mode.timer: text-[15vw] font-mono font-bold tracking-tighter tabular-nums text-orange-500

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-bold shadow-lg shadow-orange-500/20 hover:shadow-orange-500/40 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-6 py-4 border-2 border-slate-200 hover:border-slate-300 hover:bg-slate-50 text-slate-600 font-medium

cards.paragraph: group relative p-6 rounded-xl border border-transparent hover:border-orange-200 hover:bg-white hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200 cursor-pointer
cards.upload_zone: border-2 border-dashed border-slate-300 rounded-2xl bg-slate-50/50 hover:bg-white hover:border-orange-400 transition-all duration-300 flex flex-col items-center justify-center gap-4 p-12

timers.main: text-6xl lg:text-7xl font-mono font-bold tracking-tighter text-slate-800 tabular-nums

upload_background.alt: Minimalist study desk with laptop and books
upload_background.usage: Background for the upload/welcome screen with overlay

instructions_to_main_agent: Refactor the layout to use the 'Split View' strategy defined above.
Replace all generic buttons with the 'Pill' shaped styles defined in component_styles.
Ensure the 'Timer' is the visual anchor of the Right Panel.
Implement the 'Paragraph Card' styles to make the text interactive.
Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings and 'JetBrains Mono' for all time-related data.
Ensure the 'Upload Zone' uses the provided image as a subtle background or inspiration for the empty state.
Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'SaaS Blue'. Use the Slate/Orange palette.
No generic gradients. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Spacing: Use p-6 or p-8 for internal card padding.
Contrast: Ensure text is legible (Slate-600+ on White).
Motion: Add hover states to everything interactive.
